resources.string:
Welcome to the captive portal analyzer. This project has been developed during a bachelor thesis at the Ruhr university of bochum. Its purpose is to detect leaks of private information on captive portals of public WiFis. 

Thank you for helping us by collecting data from captive portals. 

Please note that some private information maybe sent to us when you proceed with the analysis. 

The application needs permission to your location to work properly. Please grant it this permission to avoid further complications.

First you have to connect with a WiFi hotspot. The log-in process can be started when you click on \"analyze hotspot\". \n\nAfter you have successfully logged into the captive portal, click on \"done\" shown in the top right corner of menu bar of the next site.
You may have to accept that the application is allowed to set a WiFi connection!
Couldn\'t find any captive portal in current WiFi connection!
Thanks for the efforts, please click on \"upload\" to upload the collected data to the server!
Looks like this network does not have any captive portal, or you have already signed in.
Thanks again for helping us to learn more about captive portal data practices. You can click on \"Delete unneeded files\" to make sure that no data is left behind. The app can be closed now.
Thanks again for you time, you can close the application now
